column5: Recently updated condo right on Seawall and only minutes away to the many attractions in the island, including fishing on the Historic 61st Pier right across the street from the complex, Pleasure Pier, Moody Gardens, Schlitterbahn Waterpark, Haunted Tours, Moody Mansion & Museum, Party Boats. Private owned until at Casa Del Mar complex that offers two tropical pools (one heated), a Barbecue area, laundry facilities.
column8: TEXAS PARADISE BEACHFRONT CONDO SEAWALL BLVD
